Name: Ravindra Jadeja
Teams: India, India U19, Rajasthan Royals, Saurashtra, Board Presidents XI, Kochi Tuskers Kerala, Chennai Super Kings, India B, Indians, India A, Gujarat Lions, India Blue, Rest of India
Bio: "First they ignore you,then they laugh at you,could well have meant to say this about Ravindra Jadeja,The best of observers ignored his left-arm spin at first,then he was ridiculed for his three triple-centuries in Ranji Trophy,the idea of Jadeja the Test player was contested when India hed him a debut in 2012-13 against conventional wisdom,but Jadeja won them all over with over after over of unerring accuracy,sits among the elite of Indian spin bowling now,Jadeja became the quickest left-arm bowler to reach 200 Test wickets,he became the first Indian since Anil Kumble - in 1996 - to top the ICC ODI bowling rankings,Jadeja drew a scarcely believable bid of US$2 million in 2012,Shane Warne had nicknamed him "Rockstar" because of his confidence in his own ability  flamboyant ways,His most valuable skill,didn't have the glamour of a rockstar: fitness  strength to be able to be at the batsmen for hours,ready to pounce on any assistance from the pitch
